Tchivira complex)</rocksmap><orebody_fm>plug</orebody_fm><ore_a>4</ore_a><ore_area>12.6</ore_area><ore_b>4</ore_b><alttype>brecciation, fenitization (ring)</alttype><altwidth>0.5</altwidth><dep5km>10</dep5km><mineral role="ore">apatite</mineral><mineral role="ore">barite</mineral><mineral role="ore">magnetite</mineral><mineral role="ore">parisite</mineral><mineral role="ore">pyrite</mineral><mineral role="ore">pyrochlore</mineral><mineral role="ore">rutile</mineral><mineral role="ore">strontianite</mineral><mineral role="ore">synchysite</mineral><mineral role="gangue">ankerite</mineral><mineral role="gangue">biotite</mineral><mineral role="gangue">calcite</mineral><mineral role="gangue">dolomite</mineral><mineral role="gangue">garnet</mineral><reference>Alberti, A, Castorina, F., Censi, P., Comin-Chiaramonti, P., and Gomes, C.B., 1999, Geochemical characteristics of Cretaceous carbonatites from Angola: Journal of African Earth Sciences, v. 29, no. 4, p. 736\ufffd\ufffd759.</reference><reference>Coltorti, M., Alberti, A., Beccaluva, L., Dos Santos, A.B., Mazzucchelli, M., Morais, E., Rivalenti, G., and Siena F., 1993, The Tchivira-Bonga alkaline-carbonatite complex (Angola)\ufffd\ufffdpetrological study and comparison with some Brazilian analogues: The European Journal of Mineralogy, v. 5, no. 6, p. 1001\ufffd\ufffd1024.</reference><reference>Kamitani, M., and Hirano, H., 1990, Important carbonatite-alkaline/alkaline complexes and related mineral resources in the world: Bulletin of the Geological Survey of Japan, v. 41, no. 11, p. 631\ufffd\ufffd640.</reference><reference>Orris, G.J., and Grauch, R.I., 2002, Rare earth element mines, deposits, and occurrences: U.S. Geological Survey Open-File Report 02-189, 174 p.</reference><reference>Woolley, A.R., 2001, Alkaline rocks and carbonatites of the world, Part 3\ufffd\ufffdAfrica: London, The Geological Society, 372 p.</reference></record>
